sentences.en: FBI agent briefed him: " We'll have our men spotted throughout the Los Angeles area. "
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局的侦探指点他: “ 我们会派人分布在整个洛杉机地区. ”

sentences.en: FBI demands its employees absolute allegiance to this bureau.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局要求其雇员对该局绝对忠诚.

sentences.en: He had fallen foul of the FBI.
sentences.cn: 他已经惹恼了联邦调查局。

sentences.en: He was a special investigator for the FBI.
sentences.cn: 他是联邦调查局的特别调查员.

sentences.en: Her job ordinarily consisted of five days a week at FBI headquarters.
sentences.cn: 她每周在联邦调查局总部上5天班.

sentences.en: I am speeding up the FBI's Uniform Crime Reports.
sentences.cn: 我在催促联邦调查局编制犯罪统计一览表.

sentences.en: I hate being stood over by the FBI.
sentences.cn: 我可讨厌受到联邦调查局的监视。
我已报告了联邦调查局.

sentences.en: Last November, Smith received the FBI's highest civilian honor , the Louis E. Peters Memorial Service Award.
sentences.cn: 去年11月史密斯获得了联邦调查局颁发的最高市民荣誉奖――路易斯?E? 彼得贡献纪念奖.

sentences.en: Police, lawyers and FBI agents were all among the groups who were unable to tell if people were lying.
sentences.cn: 团队里包括警察，律师和美国联邦调查局人员，都是那些无法辨别出人们是否在说谎。

sentences.en: Somehow the whole abortive affair got into the FBI files.
sentences.cn: 这件早已夭折的案子不知怎么就进了联邦调查局的档案.

sentences.en: The county sheriff is working with the FBI and our own city police.
sentences.cn: 县警察局长同联邦调查局和本市的警察一起干.

sentences.en: The FBI barged through the gates, demanding to search the plant for evidence.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局的探员破门而入，要求在工厂内搜寻证据。

sentences.en: The FBI kept a voluminous file on Pablo Picasso.
sentences.cn: 联邦调查局保存了有关巴勃罗·毕加索的大量档案。

sentences.en: The FBI was started under Teddy Roosevelt by Attorney General Charles Bonaparte.
sentences.cn: 联帮调查局是在特迪·罗斯福领导下由司法部长查理·波拿巴创建的.

sentences.en: The guys at the rodeo were FBI too, right ?
sentences.cn: 在竞技场的那些家伙也是联邦调查局的, 是 吗 ?

sentences.en: These kids have been under FBI surveillance for the last 6 months.
sentences.cn: 这些孩子已经被联邦调查局监视6个月了.

sentences.en: To find out who she is, they call on a local curator, as well as Bob Wittman and his FBI Art Crime Team.
sentences.cn: 为了弄清楚她是谁，他们找到了当地的博物馆，以及鲍勃·惠特曼和他的联邦调查局艺术犯罪小组。

trans.tran_cn: foreign-born Irish 国外出生的爱尔兰人，Federal Bureau of Investigation 联邦调查局

trans.tran_en: The FBI is a government agency in the United States that investigates crimes in which a national law is broken or in which the country's security is threatened
